div.p: A normal working day to me is waking up early in the morning at 7 o’clock, waking up and then looking forward to going to work
you know going to work because we have flexibility around the work so I can work around which I do 37 hours a week but I can work
my way around that so if I go in at 7 o’clock and finish early and have a longer break... It’s less stress, you know, where you don’t want to deal with it
but you’ve got to deal with it but at the end of that when you get to that end of that situation you think well it was good doing that
because you’ve overcome that and you’ve shown yourself kind of dealing with it you know in the right way.
